text: Alatrofloxacin (Trovan IV) is a fluoroquinolone antibiotic developed by Pfizer, delivered as a mesylate salt. Trovafloxacin and alatrofloxacin were both withdrawn from the U.S. market in June 2006. ==See also== * Fluoroquinolones ==References== Category:Fluoroquinolone antibiotics Category:Prodrugs Category:Hepatotoxins Category:Withdrawn drugs Category:Naphthyridines Category:Carboxylic acids
title: Alatrofloxacin
